whatIs.title: What is Cartoonify Video?
whatIs.description: Cartoonify Video is an AI tool that transforms videos into unique cartoon-style animations. It uses advanced Video Style Transfer technology to apply your selected style to a reference frame and convert the entire video while keeping original motion and facial expressions intact. Choose from a wide range of styles, including classic cartoon and modern aesthetics.

examples.title: Cartoonify Video Examples
examples.description: Explore how Cartoonify Video can transform videos into vibrant cartoon animations, maintaining motion integrity with cutting-edge Video Style Transfer technology.

steps.title: Upload Your Video
steps.content: Upload a video file (MP4, MOV, AVI) up to 15 seconds and 50MB to start the Cartoonify Video process. Longer videos will be automatically trimmed for efficient style transfer.

steps.title: Video Style Transfer Reference
steps.content: A reference frame is extracted and your chosen cartoon style is applied to ensure consistent Cartoonify Video transformation of the full video.

steps.title: Choose Artistic Style
steps.content: Select from over 100 styles or craft a custom cartoon style using text prompts or reference images to personalize your Cartoonify Video experience.

steps.title: Generate Cartoonify Video
steps.content: The complete video is transformed using the styled reference frame. Cartoonify Video ensures original motion and expressions are preserved through advanced technology.

benefits.title: Why Use Cartoonify Video
benefits.description: Cartoonify Video offers unparalleled video style transformation with motion preservation, diverse style options, and a clear pricing model.

features.content: From classic cartoons to contemporary styles, Cartoonify Video provides an extensive range of artistic styles. Create custom styles or use preset templates to Cartoonify any video.
